Package jutils

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Args
    The Args class maintains the list of valid command line arguments for a program, as well as the parsing and storing the values of the arguments for access by the rest of the program.
    Dates
    The Dates class brings together some common date conversion functionality with error checking.
    DebugInfo
    The DbgInfo class maintains the list of debug flags for the classes defined in this package.
    DebugStatus
    The DbgStatis class maintains the state of the debug params that will be used when creating other classes.
    Errs
    The Errs class is a simple class that allows classes to set error information including a number, a type (None, Error, Warning), an Error Message and StackTrace.
    FileSearch
    The FileSearch class brings together some common file locating functionality with error checking.
    FIO
    The FIO class brings together some common File functionality including opening, closing reading, and writing to files; with error checking.
    GuiInfo
    The GuiInfo class brings together some common Window functionality for programs using windowed interfaces.
    Help
    The Help class handles the returning of information in the "help Files" so that actual text in "program 'help' screens or on StdOut can be maintained in better editors, rather than directly embedded in the .java source files.
    Sleep
    The Sleep class brings together some common functionality for "sleeping" while background processes are taking place.
    Trace
    The Trace class combines the writing program information to StdOut and to files using a common set of tools.
    TraceThread
    The TraceThread class is a simple class that allows "windowed" programs to write their trace messages to a "window", without changes to the program if it currently writes to files.
    WindowRpt
    A simple window that can be opened so that text can be written on it.
